book.synopsis:
Captain Cat has joined the army!
He has whiskers and paws, and more stripes than the soldiers have ever seen. But most important, he has a best friend who can make an army barracks feel like home.
A classic from Syd Hoff, the bestselling creator of the Danny and the Dinosaur series, Captain Cat is a Level One I Can Read, which means itâ€™s perfect for children learning to sound out words and sentences.
